name: Solitaire: Wildlife Adventures
description:
Time for a break! Time to escape! Experience the Wildlife.

Win, play, compete and discover with Solitaire TriPeaks: Wildlife Adventures - the free and fun card game. It’s Solitaire with an awesome twist! If you love to play and win a game of Klondike, Freecell, Spider or Pyramid, Solitaire TriPeaks: Wildlife Adventures is the card game for you!

Compete, discover, play & win - 4 reasons why you’ll love to play Solitaire TriPeaks: Wildlife Adventures!

- Play Solitaire TriPeaks & win extra coins.
- Discover and unlock Wild Animals!
- Compete & win levels on the go - Play & win wherever you are.
- Free & fun bonuses are waiting for you every hour- Discover them today!
- Win & compete - Play & compare scores with friends or compete against yourself.

Compete daily to win a wide array of points and unleash tons of adventure with Solitaire TriPeaks: Wildlife Adventure. Imagine Spider Solitaire, Freecell or Klondike but even more amazing!

Solitaire TriPeaks: Wildlife Adventures is full of thrilling challenges and as you progress to each new level you’ll get to disarm traps, trigger boosters and compete to win hidden cards! Instead of Freecell, Pyramid or Spider Solitaire, give Solitaire TriPeaks: Wildlife Adventures a whirl! It’s the only amazing game you’ll want to play!

Download today to start earning points and blitz through your next level. Begin your exciting adventure with Solitaire TriPeaks: Wildlife Adventures today!
